parameters.name: serverCallId
parameters.description: The conversation id which can be guid or encoded cs url

CreateCallRequest.description: The request payload for create call.

sourceAlternateIdentity.description: The alternate identity of the source of the call if dialing out to a pstn number

requestedCallEvents.description: The requested call events to subscribe to.

CreateCallResponse.description: The response payload of the create call operation.

callLegId.description: Call leg id of the call.

requestedCallEvents.description: The requested call events to subscribe to.

PlayAudioRequest.description: The request payload for playing audio.

audioFileUri.description:
The media resource uri of the play audio request. 
Currently only Wave file (.wav) format audio prompts are supported.
More specifically, the audio content in the wave file must be mono (single-channel),
16-bit samples with a 16,000 (16KHz) sampling rate.

loop.description: The flag indicating whether audio file needs to be played in loop or not.

operationContext.description: The value to identify context of the operation.

audioFileId.description: An id for the media in the AudioFileUri, using which we cache the media resource.

callbackUri.description: The callback Uri to receive PlayAudio status notifications.

OperationStatus.description: Gets or sets the status of the operation

PlayAudioResponse.description: The response payload for play audio operation.

operationContext.description: Gets or sets the operation context

resultInfo.description: Gets or sets the result info

ResultInfo.description: Result info class to be used to report result status for actions/operations.

code.description:
Gets or sets the result code
For synchronous failures, this maps one-to-one with HTTP responses. For asynchronous failures or messages, it is contextual.

subcode.description:
Gets or sets the result subcode.
The subcode further classifies a failure. For example.

message.description:
Gets or sets the message
The message is a detail explanation of subcode.

CancelAllMediaOperationsRequest.description: The request payload for cancel all media operations

CancelAllMediaOperationsResponse.description: The response payload of the cancel all media operations.

operationContext.description: Gets or sets the operation context

resultInfo.description: Gets or sets the result info

alternateCallerId.description: The alternate identity of source participant.

participants.description: The list of participants to be added to the call.

StartCallRecordingRequest.description: The request payload start call recording operation.

recordingStateCallbackUri.description: The uri to send notifications to.

StartCallRecordingResponse.description: The response payload of start call recording operation.

recordingId.description: The recording id of the started recording

CallRecordingState.description: The recording state of the recording

GetCallRecordingStateResponse.description: The response payload of get call recording state operation.

JoinCallRequest.description: The request payload for join call.

requestedCallEvents.description: The requested call events to subscribe to.

JoinCallResponse.description: The response payload of the join call operation.

callLegId.description: Call leg id of the call.

CallRecordingStateChangeEvent.description: The call recording state change event.

startDateTime.description: The time of the recording started

conversationId.description: The conversation id from a out call start recording request

ToneValue.description: Gets or sets the tone detected.

ToneInfo.description: Gets or sets the tone info

sequenceId.description:
Gets or sets the sequence id. This id can be used to determine if the same tone 
was played multiple times or if any tones were missed.
